titles.title: A concurrent resolution honoring the memory of Robert Mondavi.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Mr. Clay asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Oversight and Government discharged.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/27/2008--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Honors the life of Robert Mondavi, a pioneer and a patriarch of the California wine industry.
